title: Messaging abstraction layer
summary: A standard library and conventions for producing/consuming messages so teams implement patterns consistently.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Teams re-implement retries, correlation, headers, and DLQ handling differently, increasing operational cost.
whenToUse: You need consistent telemetry and safety
whenNotToUse: Only one team builds all handlers and will remain so

gotchas: Library becomes a bottleneck if not owned
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Make it opinionated and small: correlation, idempotency hooks, telemetry, and error routing.

complexity.rationale: Good leverage when owned and versioned.
complexity.skillDemand: Platform engineering skill and API design discipline.

realWorldExample.approach: Provided a shared library for correlation and error routing across services.
realWorldExample.outcome: More consistent behavior and easier support.
